head.title: Opcode Search
head.description: Find fast and easy any opcode of gta sa.

limit.title: Highlighter opcodes
limit.description: The higher the number, the longer it will take to display the results. With 0 disables the function and -1 you will highlight all.
limit.value: Limited to number of found to

theme.title: Color theme
theme.description: Enter any CSS3 variants (hex value, color name, or functions: hex, rbg, hsl, hsv, cmyk, linear-gradient, and so on). You will see the changes in real time, so it is recommended that you make your changes before loading the database or when there are few results.
